head.title: Home - Phoenixville Area School District

meta.content: Phoenixville Area School District is one of the best public school districts in the Philadelphia Area serving children from K to 12 grade. Explore the opportunities!

div.h2: Welcome to Phoenixville Area School District

div.span:
The April 20th Board Workshop will be conducted virtually, and shown LIVE beginning at 7 pm on Phantom TV (Channel 28 on Comcast & Verizon and livestreamed through our website.
Public comments may be emailed to boardmeeting@pasd.com. At the beginning of the comment please include the individual’s name, municipality, topic to be addressed, and group affiliation, if applicable. Comments including this information will be read aloud. The reading of comments will be limited to three minutes per individual.

span.span: PASD is committed to providing meal support while schools are closed in response to the COVID-19 virus. Anyone can come to one of our five food distribution sites below between 10:30 and noon every weekday for a meal. On Friday additional food will be distributed for the weekend.

br.span:
412 Fairview Street
• K-Mart Parking Lot 1000 Nutt Road
• TCHS Pickering 1580 Charlestown Road

a.title: Learn to Translate Any Web Page

p.a: Learn to Translate Any Web Page

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-weight: 700; font-family: Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif;

div.span:
Please use the button below to access Canvas and information pertaining to the continuation of instruction along with a step-by-step guide on how to set up your Canvas account. All parents and guardians should ensure that your Canvas account log-in is set up for online learning.
Should you have any difficulties with you Canvas log-in, please email your child’s teacher or send an email to: Canvas@pasd.com
If you do not have access to home internet or other technological needs please call 484-927-5078.

a.title: School Buildings Closed Continuing Online Learning
a.span: School Buildings Closed Continuing Online Learning

div.div: It is the intent of the Phoenixville Area School District to post information on our website that is compliant with the Americans with Disabilities Act. We are now in the process of updating our content to be compliant with the W3C guidelines. It is our goal to develop a website that is accessible to everyone. If you have problems accessing a page on this site, please email the webmaster with the specific URL to inform them of the page you are unable to access.
386 City Line Avenue, Phoenixville, PA 19460 | Phone 484.927.5000 | Fax 610-933-3189
